name: Values_Game
description:
Discover your core values and be more happy in your life. 

 In numerous papers and literatures defined in assembling visions, missions and setting goals( Individually or organizationally) you'll find a common word, this word is" Values". But, what are values? Values are a collaborative and positive meanings. These values are the most important things you" value".  In some times values play motives that motivate you to do not give up.

 Why do some people take a veritably strong response toward a specific action and some people not? Are you always wandering about people's attitude? Do you ask your self why I do this particular action? 

 Our values are live in a deep place of our subconscious mind. These values are staying to be fulfilled and or defended. Your values not only define our goals but also, our interpretation to the values preventing us from achieving our goals. 

Knowing and living by your core values can help bring clarity, focus, and satisfaction into your life. knowing your core values helps us to understand ourselves better and also understand the others. In every aspects in our lives you'll find your core values live and control, in your connections, in your career, in your opinions, in your choices,. If you don't know what are your core values are so you'll spend your entire life( acting or re-acting) without knowing why are you doing this?. Your values create your entire system and world, Your values create your beliefs, your beliefs produce your thoughts, your thoughts produce your feelings and your feelings produce you behavior. In this game I'll help you to discover your core values, What's the most important to you? This game simulates the real world and how we deal with our values. ENJOY. 

For better communications and relationships let people play this game and know their core values.
